com.xceptance.xlt.ai.pre_processing

Class ImageTransformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xceptance.xlt.ai.pre_processing.ImageTransformation

  • public class ImageTransformation
extends java.lang.Object
    Main entry point to load, analyze and compare images. Load Images out of an folder and hold them for analyze. Analyze to find the ROI's (region of interest) in the image. They are saved in groups and each point is a FeaturePoint. Make use of machine learning in the computeAverageMetric(int) method.
    Author:
    Thomas Volkmann

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageTransformation

        public ImageTransformation(java.util.ArrayList<FastBitmap> imgList,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,AverageMetric> averageMet,
                           boolean trainingFlag)
        Constructor for first initialization, in this case the program is run for the first time. Load the images out of a folder and start the analyze with applyTransformation()
        Parameters:
        imgList - ArrayList of FastBitmap with all found images.
        averageMet - Loaded AverageMetric from the network.
        trainingFlag - boolean value if the network need further training or not.

      • ImageTransformation

        public ImageTransformation(FastBitmap img,
                           java.lang.String path)
        Constructor if there already is a network which can be used for further learning or comparison. Load the images out of a folder and start the analyze with applyTransformation() If the flag is on false there is just a comparison to the already learned average metric.
        Parameters:
        img - FastBitmap the current screenshot.
        path - String to the folder.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurator

        public java.util.ArrayList<PreProcessing> getCurator()
        ArrayList of all pre-processed images. Get the current MetricCurator for an image.
        Returns:
        pp ArrayList of MetricCurator for every image.

      • getAverageMetric

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,AverageMetric> getAverageMetric()
        Dictionary which hold the average metric from all seen images.
        Returns:
        averMet Dictionary of the found average metric

      • computeAverageMetric

        public java.util.ArrayList<PatternHelper> computeAverageMetric(int percentageDifference)
        Compute the pattern for the network in relevance to the average metric. Provide the data for the neural network and transform the image in a way it is linear seperable. This step is important so the perceptron network can learn the patterns and distinguish the different images.
        Parameters:
        percentageDifference - Value to reach for the network to be considered as trained.
        Returns:
        foundPattern ArrayList of PatternHelper of all found pattern if there was more than one image in the folder.

      • applyTransformation

        private void applyTransformation()
        Transformation of the image for further use. First a Convolution with a Laplace and Gaussian kernel is performed. Furthermore the edge detection via FastCornersDetector with Fast9 is performed. Next the found corners get sorted after x values and the last step is realized with PreProcessing.

      • load

        private void load(FastBitmap img,
                  java.lang.String path)
        Load all images out of a given folder path and the current screenshot.
        Parameters:
        img - FastBitmap current screenshot.
        path - String full path name to folder.

      • process

        private void process(java.util.ArrayList<FastBitmap> imgList)
        New initialization, create and load everything into the list for the images, for further use.
        Parameters:
        imgList - list of all found images in the corresponding folder.
